Description: The Montana Public Service Commission approved a settlement with NorthWestern Corp. to recover $765,000 in fines the commission unanimously assessed against the utility in late 2008 concerning the PSC's finding that the utility repeatedly violated the "limited investment basket cap" provisions of its 2004 bankruptcy stipulation.
Info Source: NorthWestern settles $765,000 Mont. fine with promises to do R&D projects, SNL Electric Utility Report, December 20, 2010 (via Nexis).
